sys_script_include.name: pop_up

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_726de9e197c16510a6e5bf36f053afb3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_852107_enterpr_0.pop_up</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>pop_up</name><script><![CDATA[var pop_up = Class.create();
pop_up.prototype = {
    abc: function(group) {
        var x = [];
        // 		var we = this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
        var xyz = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        xyz.addQuery('group', group);
        xyz.query();
        while (xyz.next()) {
            x.push(xyz.user.email.toString());
        }


        return x.join(',');
    },
    xyz: function() {
// 		var xx = [];
        var we = this.getParameter('sysparm_group');
        var xyzz = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
        xyzz.addQuery('group', we);
        xyzz.query();
        while (xyzz.next()) {
            x.push(xyzz.user.email.toString());

        }
        return x.join(',');
    },


    type: 'pop_up'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-02-16 05:06:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>726de9e197c16510a6e5bf36f053afb3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>pop_up</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture" source="x_852107_enterpr_0">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Enterprise Governance Architecture">6a425ed92fdc6110b66ad3f62799b640</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_726de9e197c16510a6e5bf36f053afb3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-02-16 07:26:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
